title: FT: Small stack of low grade raw EPDGs - ALL GONE!
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT: Small stack of low grade raw EPDGs - ALL GONE!
posts.post_content:
ALL GONE. THANK YOU!!!!!

Recently upgraded some EPDGs so these are available. Looking to trade for other EPDGs that would be upgrades, preferably graded. If you have any available, please let me know.  Would also be interested in 150 only subjects with sovereign 150 backs in any condition.

Otherwise, if you have any PSA graded stuff for trade, would consider.

Thanks!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2km8UDQ][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/50767343962_36f9d068fd_b.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2km8UF3][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/50767344032_48262558f0_b.jpg[/img][/url]

Doyle, Konetchy, Wagner and Kruger have been traded. 

Would ask 225 on remaining 4 if no one is looking to trade. Available via PM.

Thanks!
Jeff
